1.0.0.name: wordpress/goldenforms
1.0.0.description:
The fastest way to have a form on your website, use your preferred HTML editor to create your form code, copy and paste the code into a new form in GoldenForms (excluding the form's openning and closing tags), configure other form settings quickly and save, your ready to go!

Currently supported features are:

1- Custom form HTML/PHP code + custom CSS/JS code support.
2- Unlimited emails (PHP Mail and SMTP Support), with the ability to setup Auto responders and set the reply headers.
3- Thanks Message.
4- Secure Captcha.

More features to come shortly.
